data.author: Reboot's Ramblings

changelog.release_notes:
V3.1:
-Fixed a layout issue when setting Middle Large and Middle Small layers to show on wrist shake.

v3.0
Premium:
-New! Fully customizable information layers. Choose what and when information is displayed on 4 independent information layers.
-New! Music Time is now integrated will Pebble Health. Choose to display Steps, Active Time, Sleep and Distance Traveled (Km or Mi).

v2.0:
Premium:
-New! Customize Music Time to your liking with the new customization options.
-New! Music Time is now integrated will Pebble Health. You can now enable the display of your current step count (on wrist shake or persistently).
-Requires Pebble Firmware 3.9+ and Music Time companion app version 2.0.1+

-Pebble Time Round compatibility
-Removed the album art loading bar since album art loads almost instantly (with Android Companion App 1.2+)
-Requires Pebble Time/Time Round Firmware 3.6

-Pebble Time Round compatibility
-Removed the album art loading bar since album art loads almost instantly (with Android Companion App 1.2+)
-Requires Pebble Time/Time Round Firmware 3.6

data.description:
Music Time is a watch face that lets you enjoy your Music even when you aren't listening to it. The watchface colors adapt to the album art of the songs you're listening to and will even display the current album art and Pebble Health statistics for users who have upgraded to premium (via the companion app).

Premium users can also enjoy watch face customizations;
-Choose what and when information is displayed on 4 independent information layers.
-Choose to display Time, Date, Steps, Active Time, Sleep and Distance Traveled (Km or Mi).

Not listening to music for a while? No problem! Music Time will continue to let you enjoy the art from the last song you listened to.

http://itsmusicti.me

latest_release.release_notes:
V3.1:
-Fixed a layout issue when setting Middle Large and Middle Small layers to show on wrist shake.

data.title: Music Time
